text:
TIRUNELVELI

Sri Vigna Vinayagar Temple: 27th varshabhishekam, kumbha puja and homam, 7.30 a.m.; poornahuti, 9.30 a.m.; kalasabhishekam, 10 a.m.; special deepaaradhana, 11.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.; car festival, Thiyagaraja Nagar, 6.15 p.m.

Sri Maha Ganapathi Temple: Amirtha Mridhyunjeswarar maha kumbabhishekam, temple premises, Melakallur, 5.45 a.m.

Sri Uchishta Ganapathi Temple: Maha kumbabhishekam, 5.45 a.m.; maha abhishekam, 10 a.m.; veethi ulaa, Manimurtheeswaram, 7 p.m.

Department of English – St. Xavier’s College: Conference on ‘Contours of postcolonial studies: Mapping across disciplines for plurality and humanism,’ summary of first day sessions, 9 a.m.; plenary sessions, 9.10 a.m.; valediction, Rev. Fr. R. Jesu Michael Das SJ, secretary of the college, chief guest, college premises, 4 p.m.

Department of Science and Technology and Entrepreneurial Development and Research Centre – St. Xavier’s College: Entrepreneurial awareness camp, Silas Sargunam, Head, Department of Management Studies, Anna University- Tirunelveli Regional Centre, inaugurates, college premises, 8.30 a.m.; valediction, A. Lourdusamy, Internal Quality Assurance Cell Coordinator, SXC, chief guest, college premises, 12 noon.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, Good Shepherd Matriculation School, 7th Street, Thiyagaraja Nagar, 7 p.m.

KALLIDAIKURICHI

Sri Manenthiyappar Sri Vadivambikai Ambal Temple: Mahakumbabhishekam, poornahuti and parivara kumbabhishekam, 4 a.m. to 5 a.m.; 4th yagna puja and yathradhaanam, 6 a.m.; mahakumbabhishekam, between 9 a.m. and 10 a.m.; mahaabhishekam, alangaaram and deepaaradhanai, 10.30 a.m.; annadhaanam, 11 a.m.; thirukalyaanam, 6 p.m.; swami ambal veethia ulaa, 9 p.m.
title: enGaGEMENTS
